title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection is not allowed, as move up / down can be applied on more than one item. The signature preview is not wrapping as a label. The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and list should be reduced to an appropriate size. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label that can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview must wrap as a label. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as when it is hovered.
SR: To reproduce the issue, change the parameter name to something very long and observe that the preview is cut off.
